mapper.sql: ifnull(a.id,'') AS "id", ifnull(a.create_by,'') AS "createBy.id", ifnull(opt.name,'') AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", ifnull(a.update_by,'') AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", ifnull(a.remarks,'') AS "remarks", ifnull(a.del_flag,'') AS "delFlag", ifnull(a.user,'') AS "user.id", ifnull(stu.name,'') AS "user.name", ifnull(a.old_score,'') AS "oldScore", ifnull(a.new_score,'') AS "newScore"
left join sys_user stu on stu.id=a.user left join sys_user opt on opt.id=a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO score_record( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, user, old_score, new_score ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{user.id}, #{oldScore}, #{newScore} )
mapper.update: UPDATE score_record SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, user = #{user.id}, old_score = #{oldScore}, new_score = #{newScore} WHERE id = #{id}
